title: IKT KERATIN NUTRITION 75g
description:
Tame flyaways, smooth frizz, and perfect your edges with our professional-grade Hair Wax Stick. This easy-to-use styling product offers a strong, all-day hold without leaving your hair stiff, greasy, or flaky. Achieve a polished look, whether you're securing a sleek ponytail, smoothing a part, or creating detailed texture.



Key Features


Non-Greasy Formula: Provides a firm hold and a natural finish without weighing hair down.Frizz & Flyaway Control: Instantly smooths down stray hairs and baby hairs for a clean, sleek appearance.Deep Conditioning: Formulated with moisturizing ingredients to nourish your hair while styling.Easy Application: The solid stick format allows for precise and mess-free application directly to the hair.Long-Lasting Hold: Keeps your style intact throughout the day.Size: Each stick is 75g (2.7 fl. oz.).


Available Variants


We offer two distinct formulations designed for healthy, smooth styling:

Keratin Nutrition (I.K.T.): Formulated with Keratin for intensive nourishment and smoothing. Recommended for restoring vitality and managing texture, this variant is the key to sleek, healthy-looking hair. (Note: The image shows 98% for damaged hair.)Argan Oil & Protein (Lightness): Enriched with Argan Oil and Protein to provide deep moisturizing and brilliant shine. This stick is perfect for promoting hair health while locking in your style. (Note: The image shows 95% for damaged hair.)


How to Use


Apply the stick directly to the areas of the hair you want to control, smooth, or add texture to. For flyaways, gently smooth the stick over the surface of the hair. Use a comb or your fingers to refine the style.
